WHY THIS PROGRAMME IS FOR YOU

Frontmatters was founded in 2018 by St. Asuzu Alfred P. M.. He believes that the kind of technical sophistication taught by the Frontmatters can benefit at least two million Nigerian youths and probably more.

This programme is driven by his desire to see every young school leaver between ages 15 and 25 who is financially challenged with furthering his/her education, attain self reliance.

Frontmatters will nuture you through its well and carefully selected guarnteed courses to the freedom to organize your own life, make your own decisions without needing much help from other people.

We value your independence!

St. Asuzu Alfred P. M.

Tw

Known for his dazzling charm, rapier wit, and unraveled humility, Alfred is the creator of the Just Web and Software Development Tutorial and principal author of the Effective Business Ideas Academy introductory sequence. Alfred is also notorious as the founder Taahira Aamal Enterprises and Author of Sound Mind Village, but rumours that he's secretly a supervillain are slightly exaggerated.

Lee Donahoe

Tw

When he is not literally swimming with sharks or hunting powder stashes on his snowboard, you can find Lee in front of his computer designing interfaces, doing front-end development, or writing some of the interface-related Learn Enough Tutorials.

Nick Merwin

Tw

You may have seen him shredding guitar live with Capital Cities on Jimmy Kimmel, Conan or the Ellen Show, but rest assured Nick is a true Nerd at heart. He's just as happy shredding well-spec'd lines of code from a tour bus as he is from his kitchen table.

???

The future

Frontmatters is the leader in the movement to teach the Nigerian Youths technical sophistication, which includes both "hard skills" like coding, command lines, and version control and "soft skills" like guessing keyboard shortcuts, Googling error messages and knowing when to just reboot the darn thing.

We believe there are at least a billion people who can benefit from learning technical sophistication, probably more. To join our movement, sign up for our official email list now.

Background

Frontmatters is an outgrowth of the Ruby on Rails Tutorial and the Softcover Publishing Plaform. This page is part of the sample site for Learn Enough CSS and Layout to Be Dangerous, which teaches the basic Cascading Style Sheets, the language tthat allows web pages to be styled. Other related tutorials can be found at learnenough.com.
